author: Hayley Minn
title: 'They're b ds!' Kim Woodburn SWEARS on Loose Women - and then refuses to apologise!
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn caused more live daytime TV controversy today, as she swore on Loose Women - and then refused to apologise! 
The Celebrity Big Brother star is known for her shocking outbursts. 
And she turned the air blue when she swore during a discussion with Andrea McLean, Linda Robson, Nadia Sawalha and Janet Street-Porter. 
After recalling the tragic moment she buried her stillborn baby, Kim explained how much she loves children - even saying she goes to supermarkets seeking them out! Read More Kim Woodburn swore on Loose Women (Photo: ITV) She called her CBB housemates "b
